alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 245 AM EDT... At 159 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Miami to Homestead Miami Speedway. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Homestead, Coral Gables, South Miami, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Doral, Pinecrest, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, Florida City, West Miami, Westchester, Naranja, Glenvar Heights, Palmetto Bay and University Of Miami. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
